issue: File from Upstream Application is not reaching the downstream application folder.
resolution: FTR configuration (EDI) was not updated in the downstream application post informatica migration. The config was updated to resolve this issue.

issue: Hyperion Essbase script was creating the file in source folder but failed to push it to the target folder.
resolution: 2 jobs were creating 2 files at the same time which is creating deadlock while pushing the file in FTR. Jobs were rescheduled to fix this issue.

issue: Upstream to downstream FTR  failed due to Keys.
resolution: SSH keys mismatch, dev team sent the public SSH keys which FTR team updated at their end

issue: Files were created in upstream but 0 kb files were sent to downstream.
resolution: Autosys team corrected the connection at autosys server end  to Fix it.

issue: OPMN Services are down in Hyperion Essbase server
resolution: Essbase is not accessible. Windows team restarted the services to fix it

issue: Essbase server switched from Primary to backup node which is not configured.
resolution: Essbase is not accessible, Windows team needs to switch the instance back to resolve the issue.

issue: Essbase config file was corrupted
resolution: Essbase server was unreachable. Restore the config file from the backup to fix the issue

issue: Servers are not accessible due to Diskspace issue
resolution: Clean the unwanted large files/logs manually to increase the freespace to fix the issue.

issue: Treatments are getting failed as no space in Temp DB
resolution: Freed Tempdb space to fix the incident.

issue: Treatments are getting failed in Database as Tablespace is full.
resolution: Added more spaceinto the filesystem by DBA team to resolve the issue

issue: Informatica is down due to DB issue
resolution: Db password was expired and reactivation the issue was resolved.

issue: Application stopped working after DB release
resolution: While performing the Changes Dba misunderstood the requirement and decomissioned one active service by mistake. Service was restored by DBA and listeners were restarted to fix this.

issue: Application is not accessible due to disk crash
resolution: Restore the database with backup to fix this issue

issue: Batch failed in production environment due to DB connectivity issue
resolution: DBA parameter threshhold was updated to fix this issue.

issue: Application GUI was down
resolution: restart the App pool for the application to fix it.

issue: Hardware Failure: Critical server components fail, leading to server unavailability.
resolution: AI system detects hardware failures through monitoring and alerts admins for replacement.
description: A server becomes unresponsive or inaccessible, affecting services and applications.

issue: Power Supply Issues: Power disruptions cause servers to shut down unexpectedly.
resolution: AI system installs backup power supply and automatically restarts affected servers.

issue: Network Connectivity Problems: Network connection failures isolate servers from the network.
resolution: AI system detects network issues, restarts network services, and logs incidents for review.

issue: Software Crashes: Critical software running on servers crashes, rendering them unusable.
resolution: AI system attempts to restart software, roll back to stable version, or initiate a failover.

issue: Resource Exhaustion: Server resources such as CPU, memory, or disk space are fully utilized.
resolution: AI system allocates additional resources, optimizes processes, or migrates services.

issue: Index Fragmentation: Database indexes become fragmented, leading to slow query execution.
resolution: AI system schedules regular index maintenance to defragment indexes.
description: Database queries and operations slow down, impacting application performance.

issue: Data Volume Increase: Growing data volume results in longer query times and performance issues.
resolution: AI system optimizes queries, implements query caching, or proposes database partitioning.

issue: Resource Contention: Other processes compete for database resources, slowing queries.
resolution: AI system adjusts resource allocation, prioritizing critical queries.

issue: Query Plan Changes: Database query optimizer generates suboptimal query plans.
resolution: AI system analyzes query plans, identifies bottlenecks, and suggests optimizations.

issue: Server Misconfiguration: Incorrect database configuration impacts performance.
resolution: AI system detects and reverts misconfigurations, restores optimal settings.

issue: DNS Resolution Failures: DNS servers fail to resolve domain names to IP addresses.
resolution: AI system verifies DNS server health, switches to backup servers, and logs the incident.
description: Users experience connectivity problems, affecting their ability to access resources.

issue: Firewall Blocking: Incorrect firewall rules prevent users from accessing specific resources.
resolution: AI system reviews firewall rules, corrects misconfigurations, and ensures proper access.

issue: Router Malfunctions: Network routers malfunction, causing intermittent connectivity issues.
resolution: AI system monitors router health, triggers diagnostics, and alerts administrators.

issue: Bandwidth Saturation: Excessive network traffic saturates available bandwidth.
resolution: AI system identifies traffic spikes, prioritizes critical traffic, and recommends bandwidth upgrades.

issue: VPN Connectivity Problems: Users encounter problems connecting to the corporate VPN.
resolution: AI system monitors VPN connections, troubleshoots failures, and guides users through reconnection.

issue: Memory Leaks: Applications consume increasing amounts of memory, leading to crashes.
resolution: AI system monitors memory usage, triggers cleanups, and restarts affected applications.
description: Applications become slow or unresponsive, affecting user experience.

issue: Compatibility Issues: Application updates cause conflicts with other software components.
resolution: AI system tests updates in a sandbox, checks for conflicts, and recommends adjustments.

issue: Database Connection Failures: Applications cannot connect to the database.
resolution: AI system detects connection failures, retries connections, and logs the incident.

issue: Resource Starvation: Applications compete for system resources, causing slowdowns.
resolution: AI system monitors resource usage, optimizes resource allocation, and initiates load balancing.

issue: External API Failures: Applications rely on external APIs that experience outages or delays.
resolution: AI system monitors API status, switches to backup APIs, and retries failed requests.

issue: API Changes: External APIs used for data import change their structure or endpoints.
resolution: AI system adapts import scripts, tests new APIs, and updates data mapping.
description: Scheduled data import processes fail to transfer and update data.

issue: Data Format Incompatibility: Imported data is in a format not supported by the import process.
resolution: AI system identifies data format mismatches, transforms data, and retries imports.

issue: Network Disruptions: Network connectivity issues prevent data transfer from external sources.
resolution: AI system monitors network status, retries transfers, and alerts administrators.

issue: Authentication Failures: Access credentials for external sources are incorrect or expired.
resolution: AI system updates credentials, attempts reauthentication, and logs incidents.

issue: Data Volume Overload: Large data volumes overwhelm the import process.
resolution: AI system optimizes data import jobs, batches data transfers, and adjusts processing times.
